A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is dead for me.  Disney had a choice to make about the new trilogy. Having grown up on the  original trilogy I wanted a sequel to that. I Was fine was fine with new characters but I wanted to see the sequel that I hoped to see one day since return of the Jedi.   Instead Disney chose to use the original characters as segways to the new Star Wars.  I  find the new Star Wars boring. With all the characters I liked dead it's time to say goodbye.  What a terrible send off to the iconic characters that made Star Wars loved by so many
